job.title: Director of Partner Ecosystem - Strategic Alliances & Marketplace
job.description:
Wrike is the most powerful work management platform. Built for teams and organizations looking to collaborate, create, and exceed every day, Wrike brings everyone and all work into a single place to remove complexity, increase productivity, and free people up to focus on their most purposeful work.
Our vision:
A world where everyone is free to focus on their most purposeful work, together.
About the Role:
As the strategic leader of Wrike's partner ecosystems consisting of - system integrators (SIs), ISV integration partners, channel resellers, and cloud marketplace partners, you'll spearhead the evolution of our 400+ partner network into a powerful growth engine. This role sits at the intersection of strategy and executionwhere you'll architect the future of Wrike's partner ecosystem while delivering measurable business impact through strategic partnerships.
You will thrive in this role if you're a visionary who can translate complex partner relationships into scalable business frameworks, while maintaining a laser focus on customer outcomes. You possess exceptional business acumen, can navigate enterprise GTM partnerships, and have a proven track record of building programs that drive joint revenue growth and customer success.
Your Impact:
Drive ecosystem strategy:
Develop and execute a comprehensive partner strategy that aligns with Wrike's business objectives, collaborating with key stakeholders to secure buy-in and resources
Architect partner success models:
Create scalable, repeatable frameworks for partner enablement, co-selling, and joint GTM activities that drive mutual success
Lead joint value creation:
Develop compelling business cases for integrations and partnerships, establishing clear ROI metrics and mutual commitments around sales, marketing, and product initiatives
Orchestrate Go-To-Market excellence:
Coordinate cross-functional resources to support partner GTM activities, ensuring seamless execution and alignment with Wrike's sales organization
Scale field enablement:
Build programs that empower sales teams to effectively position partner solutions, working closely with sales leadership, enablement, and customer success
Champion customer success:
Create joint customer references and success stories that showcase the powerful synergy between Wrike and partners
Drive innovation:
Identify emerging partnership opportunities and develop new use cases based on customer and partner feedback to solve complex workflow challenges
Your Qualifications:
8‚Äì10+ years of experience in SaaS partnerships, strategic alliances, or business development roles with demonstrated success
Proven track record building and scaling partner programs in a global, cross-functional capacity
Experience developing and executing partner GTM strategies that drive measurable business outcomes
Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate partner data into actionable insights
Exceptional relationship-building capabilities across all organizational levels
Standout Qualities:
BS/BA degree, MBA preferred
Experience in work management, productivity, or collaboration software markets
Demonstrated success building marketplace strategies for SaaS products
Experience building joint GTM models and growth through system integrators value added resellers
Expertise in scaling growth through cloud marketplace hyperscalers like Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services and Azure
Track record of independently leading strategic initiatives that delivered significant business impact
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to influence and align diverse stakeholders
Experience in both high-growth and enterprise software environments
Team Dynamics:
We operate in a fast-paced, collaborative environment where strategic thinking meets execution excellence. Our partnership approach is data-driven, customer-centric, and focused on mutual growth. You'll have the autonomy to drive initiatives while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and impact.
At Wrike, we're building the future of collaborative work management, and our partner ecosystem is central to that vision. Join us in creating powerful connections that deliver exceptional value to our customers worldwide.
Why Join Wrike?
28 calendar days of paid vacation
Sick leave compensation
Life insurance plan
Health insurance plan
Fitness plan (800 EUR/year)
Parental leave
2 volunteer days
Full-remote & On-demand access to Co-working space
Utility allowance (30 EUR/month, subject to taxation)

Who Is Wrike and Our Culture
Were a team of innovators and creators who solve the complex work problems of today and tomorrow.
Hybrid work mode
Wrike promotes a hybrid model for team members near our office hubs in San Diego, Prague, Dublin, Nicosia, and Tallinn, with 2‚Äì3 in-office days per week to foster collaboration and teamwork. This work mode supports our culture of collaboration and solving problems fast to deliver business outcomes and win together.

We understand the customer journey, experience, and value derived from Wrike. Decision-making and action-taking are done with the customer in mind.

each bringing unique strengths that contribute to diversity of thought for better outcomes. Leveraging our own work management platform, we foster an environment of creative collaboration and shared achievement.

Its our pursuit of novel concepts that helped us create a market category. We continue to cultivate a workplace that fosters creative thinking as a means of transcending conventional boundaries and empowers us to break new ground to deliver extraordinary work management solutions.

by owning workflows from start to finish. Each member of our team is an integral part of this commitment, establishing work as a platform for personal growth and transformation, as well as collective success and growth.
